alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler; Seneca; Steuben; Tompkins; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 5:25PM EDT until August 29 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Seneca County in central New York... Schuyler County in central New York... Southeastern Yates County in central New York... Northern Chemung County in central New York... Southeastern Steuben County in central New York... Southwestern Tompkins County in central New York... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 525 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Thurston, or 13 miles northwest of Corning, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bath, Hector, Starkey, Campbell, Watkins Glen, Painted Post, Catharine, Dundee, Montour Falls and Hornby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Chemung; Schuyler; Seneca; Steuben; Tompkins; Yates
